learning_path_desc: Explore our curated video resources to enhance your farming knowledge.
weather_desc: Clear skies, ideal for post-monsoon field work.
pest_desc: Get timely pest alerts and control recommendations for your crops.
fertilizer_desc: Receive advice on fertilization and other seasonal tasks for your farm.
ask_expert_desc: Get instant help from our AI agricultural expert.
pest_desc_kharif_default: Monitor for common monsoon pests like stem borers and leafhoppers.
pest_desc_rabi_default: Watch for aphids and rust in wheat and mustard crops. Use neem oil as a preventive measure.
pest_desc_kharif_rainy: High humidity after rain increases risk of fungal diseases. Apply fungicide if needed.
pest_desc_rabi_rainy: Damp conditions can promote powdery mildew. Ensure good air circulation around plants.
pest_desc_kharif_clear: Sunny days can increase whitefly populations. Consider setting up yellow sticky traps.
pest_desc_rabi_clear: Clear weather is favorable for applying pesticides. Monitor for termite activity in dry soil.
pest_desc_kharif_cloudy: Cloudy weather can encourage sucking pests. Inspect new growth for infestations.
pest_desc_rabi_cloudy: Cloudy, humid days are ideal for aphids. Inspect new growth for infestations.
seasonal_task_kharif_default: Ensure proper drainage in fields to prevent waterlogging. Prepare for harvest of early-sown crops.
seasonal_task_rabi_default: Manage irrigation carefully to conserve water. Protect crops from frost in colder regions.
seasonal_task_kharif_rainy: Postpone irrigation. Check for and repair any field bunds damaged by heavy rain.
seasonal_task_rabi_rainy: Avoid fertilizer application during rain to prevent runoff. Drain excess water from fields.
seasonal_task_kharif_clear: Ideal weather for weeding and intercultural operations. Plan for sun-drying of harvested produce.
seasonal_task_rabi_clear: Optimal time for harvesting mature crops. Ensure soil has adequate moisture for sowing late crops.
seasonal_task_kharif_cloudy: Good time for soil nutrient uptake. Consider applying a balanced NPK fertilizer if the soil is not too wet.
seasonal_task_rabi_cloudy: Good time for soil nutrient uptake. Consider applying a balanced NPK fertilizer if the soil is not too wet.
